did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 10,500 items.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Access restrictions may apply to specific student records under the terms of the Family Educational Rights and Privacy Act (F.E.R.P.A.).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the President of the University of Virginia, 1919-1925, Accession #RG-2/1/2.472 VI, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Archival transfer, Office of the President, 1947 March 4, 1947 May 7.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Archival transfer, Office of the President, 1983 July 18. Originally accessioned as MSS 2636, 1947 March 4, with MSS 2636-a, 1947 May 7.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: Prior to 1904, the University of Virginia did not have a president, the chief administrative officer was the Chairman of the Faculty.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: These files constitute the major record series generated by Edwin Anderson Alderman, the first president of the University of Virginia. The records consist chiefly of correspondence, but also include reports, minutes, clippings, memoranda, and related papers concerning all areas of business of the president's office.
